title: attachments???
content:
why can’t i seem to figure out to add an attachment to my threads? Apparently others are doing it, but i don’t see anything anywhere that alludes to the fact that i can do it. what’s goin on?

 [‹ Hide IP](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060036/http:/typophile.com/node/12792 "Go to previous forum topic") [Does anybody have a P22 card deck for sale? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060036/http:/typophile.com/node/12725 "Go to next forum topic")
author: paul d hunt

comments.content: wait! i just saw it before i hastily posted this message? can attachments only be posted to the initial message in a thread? if so, that seems like a bug to me.

Yea, I think currently only the very first post may contain attachments..

_( But, In the meantime you could always try to temporary upload the file to an image hosting site, like [ImageShack](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060036/http:/www.imageshack.us/), [YourIMG](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060036/http:/www.yourimg.com/), [TinyPic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060036/http:/www.tinypic.com/) or even [Flickr](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060036/http:/www.flickr.com/), and link to it from here.. )_

Ahh, so it isn’t just me who can’t post attachments :-)  
Thanks Paul, I was beginning to feel like such a dufus.

ChrisL
